description:
Household Converter Lite V1.1.3 will now also convert bushels. It has been tested & works on the Pre 2 (webOS 2.x). Now Pre 2 users can also take the tedium out of everyday tasks with Household Converter Lite. 

Household Converter Lite is a free, limited functionality, copy of Household Converter which is used to convert common measurements used around the home, office or for school work. Some functionality is only available in the full-featured Household Converter available through the Palm App Catalog. 

Household Converter (full functionality) is a tool used in everyday household tasks for converting various measurements. It is especially useful in cooking, sewing, measuring or to accomplish school work assignments when the need for converting arises. It will convert, back and forth, between US and metric measurements such as length, weight, liquid measure, dry measure, temperature, area, angles, and computer number bases (binary, octal, hex, and decimal). It is also used to figure dates such as adding or subtracting days to or from a date to derive a new date or to find out how many days between two dates. Converting between fractions and decimals is also provided. That is, it will convert a fraction to a decimal and a decimal to a fraction. 

Lastly, recently added functionality to the full functionality Household Converter will handle area measurements. It will display formulas and calculate various area measurements and perimeters for circles, squares, rectangles, equilateral triangles, right triangles, scalene triangles, parallelograms and trapezoids.
